pullRequest.title: Support the ability to create the schemas on database schema generation
pullRequest.bodyText:
Also reorganize the generation. config properties in passing.
Fixes #11818

commit.message: Convert the JPA PostgreSQL test case to Quarkus config

Support the ability to create the schemas on database schema generation

Also reorganize the `generation.` config properties in passing.

Fixes #11818

beforeCommit.message:
Support the ability to create the schemas on database schema generation

Also reorganize the `generation.` config properties in passing.

Fixes #11818

afterCommit.message:
Support the ability to create the schemas on database schema generation

Also reorganize the `generation.` config properties in passing.

Fixes #11818

nodes.bodyText: Note that the new config nesting makes this the default name.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -252,20 +252,10 @@ public boolean isAnyPropertySet() {
         private static final String DEFAULT_CHARSET = "UTF-8";
 
         /**
-         * Select whether the database schema is generated or not.
-         *
-         * `drop-and-create` is awesome in development mode.
-         *
-         * Accepted values: `none`, `create`, `drop-and-create`, `drop`, `update`.
-         */
-        @ConfigItem(defaultValue = "none")
-        public String generation;
-
-        /**
-         * Whether we should stop on the first error when applying the schema.
+         * Schema generation configuration.
          */
-        @ConfigItem(name = "generation.halt-on-error")
